name: Sannys Comically Random Place
description:
This is an Awkwardness Maze Spinoff made to revisit the classic ass charm that old am 2 versions brought back when the standards were low as crap, 

its 2021, your bored as crap so you go visit some random places when you find a building that reminds you of a certain classic place, your lacking eggnog to so what do you do? thats right, rob the places eggnog, certainly there wont be someone trying to strangle you in there right? hehe.

cast :

Sanny : he cool guy, he cool as funk

File : he can shoot files with his bare hands for no fucking reason other than logic being non-existent for him.

Beany : they are swag af, wouldnt you respect them? also BEAN!

credits :
